title: Affinity Diagramming for Collaboratively Sorting UX Findings and Design Ide
excerpt: Use affinity diagramming to cluster and organize research findings or to sort design ideas in ideation workshops.

title: Avoiding 3 Common Pitfalls of Affinity Diagramming
excerpt: Inexperienced facilitation in affinity diagramming workshops can lead to groupings that do not serve the team goals or misrepresent underlying issues.
